name: Totem Tribe Gold
summary:
Help Aruku, a chief of the Hawk tribe, restore peace and lead her tribe to a better future in this fabulous mix of adventure, hidden object, and strategy!

The island community used to be a peaceful tribe until a comet came from the sky. Tribes and creatures that once lived peacefully together are now combative. Explore the islands, gather sacred Totems and return them to the Cradle of the North to restore the balance and return the lost peace. Develop your villages, recruit warriors, and research better weapons, skills, and equipment by building huts, training grounds, archery ranges, scout lodges and barracks. Bring prosperity back to this struggling planet in Totem Tribe Gold!
